Receive Free Shipping with your viking-direct.co.uk order today You can only use one Viking Direct discount code per order. If you try to apply another code, it will replace the current one in your cart. To maximize savings, make sure you're checking out with the best Viking Direct coupon codes available. You will never miss out on Viking Direct sales when you shop during the holidays. Viking Direct typically offers promotions during Christmas, Black Friday, and Cyber Monday. These Viking Direct promo codes are usually posted to their homepage, but you can also sign up for their newsletter to make sure you never miss out on potential savings. The easiest way to stay on top of Viking Direct deals is by subscribing to their newsletter for Viking Direct discount codes straight to your inbox. If you prefer not to receive emails, you can follow them on social media or visit their homepage regularly. Viking Direct offers free standard shipping within the UK Mainland on orders over £59. Orders under that amount will incur a £4.95 shipping fee. For free shipping to the Channel Islands or offshore UK destinations, your order must exceed £150. For more ways to save, check out CouponFollow for additional Viking Direct coupon codes. You can receive a full refund when you return your Viking Direct items within 30 days of receipt. The items must be in good condition, unassembled, and in their original packaging. To start a return, contact Viking Direct customer support. Before contacting Viking Direct support, we recommend you visit their Customer Service page to see if your issue can be resolved there. If not, there are multiple ways to contact Viking Direct customer service. First, you can use their Live Chat feature, which is live from 9 a.m. to 5 p.m. weekdays. You can also fill out their form or call them at 0330 128 1399 from 8 a.m. to 6 p.m. weekdays. Since 1960, Viking Direct has been helping people create their ideal workspaces, whether at home or in the office. From ergonomic furniture to office supplies, they’ve got everything you need to stay productive—and they make it all affordable. Shopping at Viking Direct isn’t just about ticking things off your list; it’s about building a space that works for you, all while keeping your budget in check. So, the next time you’re looking to upgrade your office or grab a few supplies, make sure to use a Viking Direct discount code from CouponFollow to make those savings stack up!
